author: davidlange6
body: MiniAOD integration work: Add "PAT" step to cmsDriver which for the moment is a placeholder where the miniAOD will run - can also be used for analysis trains. Added event content definitions in standard location for MINIAOD and MINIAODSIM. Added unscheduled mode (needed for PAT) as an option to cmsDriver (off by default).
title: Pat in cms driver
